price: እናንተም አሸናፊዎቹ ስትኾኑ አላህ ከእናንተ ጋር ሲሆን አትድከሙ፡፡ ወደ ዕርቅም አትጥሩ፡፡ ሥራዎቻችሁንም ፈጽሞ አያጎድልባችሁም፡፡
arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falā tahinū watadʿū ilā al-salmi wa-antumu al-aʿlawna wal-lahu maʿakum walan yatirakum aʿmālakum
